channel.title: Joomla! Official News
channel.description: Joomla! - the dynamic portal engine and content management system

item.title: Joomla 4.3.0 Release Candidate 3 - test the final package
item.description: The Joomla Project is pleased to announce the availability of Joomla 4.3.0 Release Candidate 3 for testing.
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.3.0 Release Candidate 2 - test the final package
item.description: The Joomla Project is pleased to announce the availability of Joomla 4.3.0 Release Candidate 2 for testing.
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.3.0 Release Candidate 1 - test the final package
item.description: The Joomla Project is pleased to announce the availability of Joomla 4.3.0 Release Candidate 1 for testing.
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.2.9 Bug Fix Release
item.description: Joomla! 4.2.9 is now available. This is a Bug Fix release for the 4.x series of Joomla!
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.2.8 Security Release
item.description: Joomla! 4.2.8 is now available. This is a security release for the 4.x series of Joomla! which addresses a critical security vulnerability in the web services API. We strongly recommend that you update your sites immediately.
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla! 4.2.8 - Important Security Announcement - Patch Available Soon
item.description: A Joomla 4.2.8 release containing a security fix will be published on Thursday, 16th February at approximately 16:00 UTC
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.2.7 Security and Bug Fix Release
item.description: Joomla 4.2.7 is now available. This is a security and bug fix release for the 4.x series of Joomla.
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.2.6 Bug Fix Release
item.description: Joomla 4.2.6 is now available. This is a bug fix release for the 4.x series of Joomla.
item.author: feed@example.com (Joomla)

item.title: Joomla 4.2.5 Security and Bug Fix release
item.description: Joomla 4.2.5 is now available. This is a security and bug fix release for the 4.x series of Joomla which addresses 1 security vulnerability.
item.author: feed@example.com (The Joomla! Project)

item.title: Sunset on GLIP as Joomla welcomes Mattermost
item.description: We all have a new home for our daily communication.
item.author: feed@example.com (Operations Department)
